name: Escape the Mansion (Jawn12345)
description:
You are trapped in an empty mansion...with a talking statue? Solve puzzles to escape the mansion.

Keys:

  • WASD/Arrow - Move
  • Space - Interact

Art By:

  • LimeZu, https://limezu.itch.io/

Music:

  • Freesound - "Creepy Foreboding Horror Music" by Audio_Dread
  • Freesound - "Fire Fuse Ignite Flame Mid" by EminYILDIRIM
